info.name: Customizable Tumblr dashboard
info.description: Customize the "White/Grey and Black Tumblr dashboard" made by by behindmylove.tumblr.com by choosing your own background and header colours.
info.additionalInfo:
Original version: userstyles.org/styles/72783

Changes to the original:
-Photos do not have rounded corners
-Notifications and sidebar have rounded corners
-Missing line in sidebar added
-Tweaks to the appearance of notifications
-Fixed blog settings page
all credit goes to the original author, enjoy!
